snippet.title: The Studio of Zabendo official Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
You play as Theo Abescar, a detective who is determined to find out what happened to his favorite park and cartoon when he was a child.

Theo really liked of a cartoon as a child, the cartoon was called Zabendo, a cartoon dedicated to children, the Studio called Hope & Dream Studio, after the success of the cartoon, started selling products, making plays and most importantly, an amusement park! But one day the owner of all this empire was arrested but the media didn't make it clear why he was arrested but now as an adult Theo will discover the truth on his own.

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2567820/The_Studio_of_Zabendo/
